thread.title: This robot automatically prints burns Trump's tweets
thread.title_full: This robot automatically prints and burns Trump's tweets

title: This robot automatically prints burns Trump's tweets
text:
This robot automatically prints and burns Trump’s tweets by Bryan Clark — in Gadgets 
26 shares If asked to describe President Trump’s Twitter persona, I’d say he was a can of gasoline looking for a lit match.
Incendiary tweets manage to rile supporters and skeptics alike, and all we can do is watch the world burn, at least figuratively, each time Trump hits the “Tweet” button. This isn’t by accident, Trump enjoys the attention.
Ever been to a tech festival? TNW Conference won best European Event 2016 for our festival vibe. See what's in store for 2017.
LEARN MORE A Twitter bot manages to make this analogy a literal one, and outshine Trump in the process. For each tweet, @burnedyourtweet does just what its name suggests: prints, cuts, grabs, moves, and burns the message.
. @RealDonaldTrump I burned your tweet. pic.twitter.com/B0f1v0FkEb 
— Burned Your Tweet (@burnedyourtweet) March 28, 2017 

Trump’s 27 million Twitter followers probably aren’t as impressed with it as I am.
